product_name: Rite in the Rain Outdoor Journal Pouch Kit
long_description: The Rite in the Rain Outdoor Journal Pouch kit features a durable fabric pouch and unique, all-weather paper that sheds water and preserves the written image, even when wet. Cordura(R) nylon pouch features 2 pockets, belt loops and a protective flap with a quick-release buckle. All-weather paper is widely used throughout the world for recording critical field data in all kinds of weather conditions. Lined paper pages are wire-bound with recycled plastic front and back covers that protect your notes. Neither ink nor graphite will bleed on paper. The Rite in the Rain Outdoor Journal Pouch kit includes an all-weather pen.
short_description: The Rite in the Rain Outdoor Journal Pouch kit features a durable fabric pouch and unique, all-weather paper that sheds water and preserves the written image, even when wet.
